title: Will trade  a turky red for an M116 Brown
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Will trade  a turky red for an M116 Brown
posts.post_content:
Got a cool Turkey Red id like to trade for an M116 Mordecai brown. Just seeing if there is any interest. Also have a couple ramly's (Steinfeldt, schulte). PM me if interested.
